mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_PETINFO ( PET_SERIAL, MEMBER_SERIAL, IMAGE_SOURCE, ANIMAL_TYPE, PET_NAME, PET_GENDER, PET_VARIETY, PET_AGE, PET_SIZE, TNR, PET_WEIGHT, PET_BIRTH, NECK_LENGTH, BACK_LENGTH, CHEST_LENGTH, PET_ETC, IMAGE_SOURCE_ORINAME) VALUES ( PET_SEQ.NEXTVAL , #{member_serial}, 'upload', #{animal_type}, #{pet_name}, #{pet_gender}, #{pet_variety}, #{pet_age}, #{pet_size}, #{tnr}, #{pet_weight}, TO_DATE(#{pet_birth}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), #{neck_length}, #{back_length}, #{chest_length}, #{pet_etc}, #{image_source_oriname})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_PETINFO SET IMAGE_SOURCE = 're-upload', PET_NAME = #{pet_name}, PET_GENDER = #{pet_gender}, PET_VARIETY = #{pet_variety}, PET_AGE = #{pet_age}, PET_SIZE = #{pet_size}, TNR = #{tnr }, PET_WEIGHT = #{pet_weight}, PET_BIRTH = TO_DATE(#{pet_birth}, 'yyyy-MM-dd'), NECK_LENGTH = #{neck_length}, BACK_LENGTH = #{back_length}, CHEST_LENGTH = #{chest_length}, PET_ETC = #{pet_etc}, IMAGE_SOURCE_ORINAME = #{image_source_oriname} WHERE PET_SERIAL = #{pet_serial }
mapper.select: SELECT PET_SERIAL, MEMBER_SERIAL, IMAGE_SOURCE, ANIMAL_TYPE, PET_NAME, PET_GENDER, PET_VARIETY, PET_AGE, PET_SIZE, TNR, PET_WEIGHT, PET_BIRTH, NECK_LENGTH, BACK_LENGTH, CHEST_LENGTH, PET_ETC, IMAGE_SOURCE_ORINAME FROM USER_PETINFO WHERE PET_SERIAL = #{pet_serial }

SELECT PET_SERIAL, MEMBER_SERIAL, IMAGE_SOURCE, ANIMAL_TYPE, PET_NAME, PET_GENDER, PET_VARIETY, PET_AGE, PET_SIZE, TNR, PET_WEIGHT, PET_BIRTH, NECK_LENGTH, BACK_LENGTH, CHEST_LENGTH, PET_ETC, IMAGE_SOURCE_ORINAME FROM USER_PETINFO WHERE MEMBER_SERIAL = #{member_serial } ORDER BY PET_SERIAL ASC
